channel.title: CVE Feed for Thinking Software -- Efence
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Thinking Software -- Efence

item.title: CVE-2023-32754|2023-06-16T00:00:00 -- thinking%20software -- efence
item.description: Thinking Software Efence login function has insufficient validation for user input. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to inject arbitrary SQL commands to access, modify or delete database.
